walletConnect.title: Algorand WalletConnect
walletConnect.description: Use WalletConnect to link your Algorand wallet to AlgoMart.
walletConnect.helpText: Need a wallet? Get one here:
walletConnect.orCancel: or cancel and disconnect from wallet

transfer.title: Transfer to wallet
transfer.body: Transfer your NFT to an external Algorand wallet. NFTs transferred to an external wallet will no longer appear in your collection.

cannotTransfer.frozen: This NFT is frozen and cannot be transferred.

sell.title: Sell
sell.body: List your NFT for sale on our secondary market. Listings can be removed at any time.
sell.listed: <0>This NFT is listed for sale at a price of <1>{{price}}</1>. You can remove the listing to set a new price.</0>
sell.listForSaleComingSoon: Sell My NFT is coming soon
sell.noUser: The current owner of this NFT is not known, it cannot be purchased
sell.notOwner: You are not the owner of this NFT, you cannot list it for sale
sell.transactedRecently: This NFT was part of a recent transaction, it cannot be listed until {{date}}
sell.isListed: This NFT is already listed, it cannot be listed again

purchase.title: Purchase
purchase.isOwner: You are the owner of this NFT, you cannot purchase it from yourself
purchase.noUser: The current owner of this NFT is not known, it cannot be purchased

listForSaleStatus.success: Success! Your NFT is listed for sale.

delistStatus.success: Success! Your NFT has been delisted.

exportStatus.optingIn: Please confirm the transactions in your wallet to opt-in to the NFT.

404.title: Error transferring NFT: Account not found
404.subtitle: This could occur if you have yet to use your account to do any transactions

exportStatus.signTransaction: Please confirm the transactions in your wallet to transfer the NFT.
